Hello all!

A company I am working with will soon be offering affordable KVM servers, however we want to offer a few probably 5-10 free test VPS's so we can work out any bugs along the way before launch. 

To apply for the Beta VPS all you need to do is comment below telling me you would like one and the desired login  name and OS you want. I will then PM you with the details.

The OS's you may pick from are as follows:

CentOS 6
CentOS 5 
CentOS 5 w/cpanel
Fedora 17
Ubuntu 12.10
Windows Server 2008 R2 Enterprise (provide own license)

All are 64 bit.


The test will last at least 24 hours, but for as long as we need to pick out all the bugs.

The specs for the KVM test are as follows:
1GB Ram
4 core access
60GB Drive (Raid 10)
1.5TB BW
100Mbps port (Node is 1Gbps)
SolusVM
located in Phoenix Arizona

The only thing we ask for in return is to post any issues you have or bugs and report them to us :)

If it works well for you, please post that as well.

Thanks everyone and hope you enjoy!
